markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[One Shot, One Kill](/Actions.aspx?ID=915) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 110</row>

**Trigger** You roll [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) for initiative.

</column>

---

Your first shot is the deadliest. Interact to draw a firearm or crossbow. On your first turn, your first Strike with that weapon deals an additional 1d6 precision damage. This precision damage increases to 2d6 at 9th level and 3d6 at 15th level.
name: One Shot, One Kill

text: One Shot, One Kill Free Action Source Guns & Gears pg. 110 Trigger You roll Stealth for initiative. --- Your first shot is the deadliest. Interact to draw a firearm or crossbow. On your first turn, your first Strike with that weapon deals an additional 1d6 precision damage. This precision damage increases to 2d6 at 9th level and 3d6 at 15th level.
